channel.title: How to make it when a player removes an item
channel.description: I have a ammy that boosts range and mage but when you take it off it doesnt reset mage and range to original level. SO if you keep taking it off and on your range and mage levels will be extremely high. So i want it when you take it off your levels go back to normal. Thanks

item.title: How to make it when a player removes an item
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The part where you got the error…

NRR:

if(c.removeId == ###) {

All you do is replace that with the correct variable…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it when a player removes an item

item.title: How to make it when a player removes an item
item.dc:creator: @NRR NRR
item.description:
@NRR wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:548862”]Use the variable in the method, not one defined for the client object.

^See, use one of those. Logically, you’d use wearID.[/quote]

im new to this, so what exactly would i add to removeitem.java that code with the id of the item? and what would go for int slot?
thanks for the help.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it when a player removes an item

item.title: How to make it when a player removes an item
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Use the variable in the method, not one defined for the client object.

^See, use one of those. Logically, you’d use wearID.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it when a player removes an item

item.title: How to make it when a player removes an item
item.dc:creator: @NRR NRR
item.description:
@NRR wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Uhm in the removeItem method you could do the exact same check as you do in the wearItem method, just replace the + stat with a - stat.

i had the +stats in itemassistant.java

i add to removeitem.java

			if(c.removeId == ###) {

and i get an error that says : cannot find symbol
symbol : variable removeid
location : variable c of type client

its pointing to the period after c and between removeId

thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it when a player removes an item
